sub_title: Regional Program Manager Environment, Health & Safety bij Google
summary:
GLOBAL CORPORATE SAFETY MANAGEMENT

• NEBOSH certified in Occupational Health and Safety
• Cultural Anthropologist with diverse international research and work experience
• Management experience in occupational safety in a high paced international environment, working with stakeholders from across functions and regions. 

As a cultural anthropologist and occupational safety expert, I combine my passion for (corporate) anthropology with my acquired practical experience and skills. Having lived and studied, performed research and worked in Italy, South Korea, Cambodia, Papua New Guinea, Solomon Islands, Portugal and Amsterdam, I know how to take local culture into account when implementing corporate policies - this anthropological insight is often of crucial importance when launching head office initiated project and programmes in local environments.

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 1441, 'name': 'Google', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHiNSL4Or29cg/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856215226?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=J9ZwRSZnZlBISDQCRp4JiThViE6opp_o6iyirV7HgFY', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/google/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Nederland', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Google', 'description': None, 'title': 'Regional Program Manager Environment, Health & Safety', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 3131, 'name': 'The HEINEKEN Company', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQE_MgdbaCMs4g/company-logo_400_400/0/1659342070311?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=FhVX06Y83hRk690i4qVU9FVIAiWpXWNDP-nsQwTF8I4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/heineken/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam en omgeving, Nederland', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'The HEINEKEN Company', 'description': "Coordinating the implementation of the company's safety strategy for all HEINEKEN Operating Companies globally, for both production and non-production activities.

Key responsibilities include:

- Coordinating the local implementation of occupational health and safety strategies. 

- Advising and assisting Operating Companies' Management Teams with the implementation and maintenance of a risk based safety management system.

- Being HEINEKEN’s subject matter expert on Safety; in this role assist Safety professionals in the business (OpCo’s, Supply Chain and Commerce) with hands-on technical and non-technical solutions.

- Monitoring and analysing safety and accident data in collaboration with the Operating Company's safety manager and HR Directors; identify (future) safety risks and bring these to the attention of the responsible management team.

- Maintaining central OpCo safety risk profiles and owning the global safety standards, policies and procedures that are part of the Safety Control Framework.

- Owning the HEINEKEN’s Life-Saving Rules and develop programs to communicate those and assess their effectiveness. 

- Coordination of the global audit programme. Carrying out audits and gather the necessary information to be able to make a fair assessment on the safety performance of the company.

- Developing the global contractor safety management program.

- Advising on due diligence and business integration projects", 'title': 'Safety Systems & Assurance Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 44066, 'name': 'Central de Cervejas e Bebidas', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEmpk5tme6Ykg/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856509181?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=yppPcEYmyOJi3fvIDa8SpsoHqyr1fKBhOk4iqhP8DHM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/centraldecervejasebebidas/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Lissabon en omgeving, Portugal', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Central de Cervejas e Bebidas', 'description': 'Short term assignment in the HEINEKEN Operating Company in Portugal (1800+ FTE, team of five direct reports)

As Safety, Health and Environment Manager I was responsible for the full scope of the business of : beer brewery, water plant, and wholesaler and distribution company that includes 15 warehouses throughout the country. 

Strategic objectives included:

- Expanding the safety governance across all areas to bring shared knowledge and collaboration on safety culture
- Driving an ORR team focusing on the top contributing factors to accidents in Distribution and implementing a variety of practical solutions. Reduction of 17% of accidents in this category and developed plan and secured budget for longer-term solutions.
- Supporting senior and middle management with critical safety-related decisions and by providing coaching on Behaviour Based Safety preventive observations.
- Advancing on Life Saving Rules action plan 
- Telematics implementation in full fleet', 'title': 'Safety, Environment & Occupational Health Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 3131, 'name': 'The HEINEKEN Company', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQE_MgdbaCMs4g/company-logo_400_400/0/1659342070311?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=FhVX06Y83hRk690i4qVU9FVIAiWpXWNDP-nsQwTF8I4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/heineken/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'The HEINEKEN Company', 'description': "HEINEKEN's vision for safety is to make the company a zero accident workplace by driving safe behaviours through all functions. In my role in the Global Health & Safety department I am responsible for operations in HEINEKEN operating companies in over 70 countries, including developing markets.

Key responsibilities and projects:

• Supporting HEINEKEN Operating Companies and their HR and Supply Chain Directors globally with the implementation of the Global Safety Strategy, and guiding the Regions in setting up corporate safety programmes and targets.

• Global implementation of the HEINEKEN Life Saving Rules that have become effective as of January 2016. Guiding the operating companies in their performance of gap assessments, providing support with their creation of action plans, and assessing action plans and current performance.

• Managing important aspects of the HEINEKEN Road Safety campaign such as road safety focused communications, organization and presentation of the HEINEKEN Road Safety Officer Course, and monitoring of company-wide compliance with defensive driving training requirements.

• Assisting in the continuous development of a confidential incident and accident data reporting software tool and completion of the global data validation processes. 

• Accident data analysis and report creation (e.g. for the company's annual Sustainability Report and reports to the Regional Presidents and the Executive Team)

• Responsible for knowledge management and good practice sharing across functions and operating companies.

• Organizing workshops and conferences, also including external stakeholders; developing and conducting trainings for safety professionals across regions.", 'title': 'Project Manager Global Safety', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'The HEINEKEN Company', 'description': "Supporting and coordinating various global health and safety related programmes such as Heineken's internal alcohol policy, HIV treatment management in Africa, and emergency response plans for Heineken breweries world wide.", 'title': 'Project Support Global Health & Safety', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Papua New Guinea / Solomon Islands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'The HEINEKEN Company', 'description': "Assignment in Papua New Guinea and Solomon Islands to implement Heineken's internal alcohol policy and alcohol information, prevention and support programme. 

Combining anthropological research with risk assessment, gap analysis and training needs analysis, I have protocols, policies and processes to safeguard correct implementation of Heineken's global policy in SP Brewery company-wide throughout Papua New Guinea and in SolBrew in Honiara, Solomon Islands. I have also developed a communication toolkit as well as an alcohol advice and counseling toolkit for the company's in-house clinics.

Other achievements included providing trainings and workshops on all levels from supply chain operators to management team and achieving quick wins through practical improvements in the work environment, as well as establishing partnerships with external professional alcohol counselors in light of a newly created Employee Assistance Program.", 'title': 'Project Officer - Papua New Guinea', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'The HEINEKEN Company', 'description': None, 'title': 'Project Officer - Global Health & Safety department (Global HR)', 'employment_type': None}]}]
